nodes.text: The Bravis Sith Lightsaber Crystal was a lightsaber crystal used by the Bravis Sith. The resulting blade emmitted by the lightsaber hilt sparkled. The crystals were often used in Bravis Sith Lightsabers.

The Bravis Sith Lightsaber Crystal first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)" as a reward for Jedi members and galactic passport owners during the SOE's Super Fan Holidays event that took place during late November, 2010. It has the same effect as the Crimson Prowler Lightsaber.
